author: Reuters
title: Oil plunges to 18-year lows, shares sink again on fears coronavirus shutdown could last months
description: 'I have been in this business almost 30 years and this is the fastest correction I have seen'
content:
LONDON/SYDNEY — Oil took another eyewatering 8 per cent tumble on Monday and world shares buckled again as fears mounted that the global coronavirus shutdown could last for months.
There were some bright spots, with Australian equities posting a standout jum… [+5321 chars]
